author: anunez1217
title: Hotel Marignan is always a good idea.
text:
What a quaint little gem with the most friendly and courteous staff ready to assist you in whatever you need! The breakfast was amazing and the mini bar in the room was adorable and sorted with many goodies. We loved having a separate tub and shower. Highly recommend the Eiffel Tower view room. Exceptionally comfortable mattresses!!!
Mr. & Mrs. Nunez
Pembroke Pines, Florida
